+class Animal:%0A    def __init__(self, species: str, sound: str):%0A        self.species: str = species%0A        self.sound: str = sound%0A        self.age: int = 0%0A    %0A    def ageBy(self, increment: int):%0A        # se j%C3%A1 est%C3%A1 morto, n%C3%A3o envelhece mais%0A        if self.age %3E= 4:%0A            print(f%22warning: %7Bself.species%7D morreu%22)%0A            self.age = 4%0A            return%0A        self.age += increment%0A        if self.age %3E= 4:%0A            print(f%22warning: %7Bself.species%7D morreu%22)%0A            self.age = 4%0A%0A    def makeSound(self):%0A        if self.age == 0:%0A            return %22---%22%0A        elif self.age %3E= 4:%0A            return %22RIP%22%0A        else:%0A            return self.sound%0A%0A    def __str__(self):%0A        return f%22%7Bself.species%7D:%7Bself.age%7D:%7Bself.sound%7D%22%0A%0A%0Adef main():%0A    animal = Animal(%22%22, %22%22)%0A    while True:%0A        line: str = input()%0A        print(%22$%22 + line)%0A        args: list%5Bstr%5D = line.split(%22 %22)%0A%0A        if args%5B0%5D == %22end%22:%0A            break%0A%0A        elif args%5B0%5D == %22init%22:%0A            if len(args) %3C 3:%0A                print(%22fail: uso correto -%3E init %3Cespecie%3E %3Csom%3E%22)%0A                continue%0A            species = args%5B1%5D%0A            sound = args%5B2%5D%0A            animal = Animal(species, sound)%0A%0A        elif args%5B0%5D == %22show%22:%0A            print(animal)%0A%0A        elif args%5B0%5D == %22grow%22:%0A            if len(args) %3C 2:%0A                print(%22fail: uso correto -%3E grow %3Cincremento%3E%22)%0A                continue%0A            increment = int(args%5B1%5D)%0A            animal.ageBy(increment)%0A%0A        elif args%5B0%5D == %22noise%22:%0A            print(animal.makeSound())%0A%0A        else:%0A            print(%22fail: comando desconhecido%22)%0A%0A%0Amain()%0A
